p: As of April 30th, 2020 there were approximately 3.1 M confirmed cases of COVID-19 worldwide and more than 217.000 infection-related deaths. SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV have caused more than 10,000 cumulative cases in the past two decades, with mortality rates of 9,6% for SARS-CoV and 37% for MERS-CoV, respectively [ 4– 7].
